page.head: Radio
page.body:
Listen to these radio interviews with Dr. Goodtooth on Genisis Global Radio: The Origin of Information.
In this interview, Dr. Goodtooth discusses Early Childhood Caries, or cavities known as baby bottle decay. He discusses the causes and prevention of decay, as well as flossing, and the complications related to tooth decay. Radio Interview 1
In this interview, Dr. Goodtooh discusses how to clean teeth, as well as plaque, decay, and the lifelong effects of decay. Radio Interview 2
